metadata.name: IIS WebServer Access Logs Deleted
metadata.comment: Detects the deletion of IIS WebServer access logs which may indicate an attempt to destroy forensic evidence

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('4') AND contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\inetpub\\logs\\logfiles\\')) AND endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.log')))

output.summary: Detects the deletion of IIS WebServer access logs which may indicate an attempt to destroy forensic evidence

metadata.objective: False positives: 1. During uninstallation of the IIS service 2. During log rotation Reference: https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/security/current/webserver-access-logs-deleted.html
